comment.text: The translation key "ProviderURLTooltip" is used to display a tooltip for the "Issuer URL" label in the Single Sign On settings page, helping users understand the purpose of entering an entity ID. This tooltip appears next to a field where users can enter a provider's URL.

usage.context:
<SsoFormField
 labelText={t("ProviderURL")}
 name="entityId"
 placeholder={PROVIDER_URL}
 tabIndex={5}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("ProviderURLTooltip")}</Text>}
 tooltipClass="provider-url-tooltip icon-button"
 value={entityId}
 hasError={entityIdHasError}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entity Id' is not accurately reflected in the Arabic translation. 'معرف كيان' is a literal translation of 'Entity Id' but might not be readily understood by all users. A more user-friendly equivalent explaining the purpose of the ID would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrase like 'معرف الهوية الرقمية لمزود الخدمة' (Digital Identity Identifier for the Service Provider) or 'رقم تعريف مزود الهوية' (Identity Provider Identification Number).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the parenthetical '(رابط جهة الإصدار)' after the main phrase creates a slight disconnect. It would be more natural to integrate the 'Issuer URL' concept more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase as 'معرف كيان مزود الهوية (جهة الإصدار)' or even better, incorporate it into the preceding phrase as suggested in the 'incorrect_translation' issue.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İdentifikasiya Provayderi Müəssisə ID-si (URL verən)' is not a precise equivalent of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. 'Müəssisə ID-si' translates more to 'Establishment ID' rather than 'Entity ID'. 'URL verən' which means 'URL provider' is an awkward phrasing for 'Issuer URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Kimlik Təkrarı Xidməti Müəssisə ID-si (Verici URL)' or 'Kimlik Təkrarı Xidməti Varlığı ID-si (Verici URL)'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation uses a mix of capitalization. Consistency in capitalization would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider capitalizing the first letter of each major word, e.g., 'Kimlik Təkrarı Xidməti Müəssisə ID-si (Verici URL)'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Идентификация на обекта на доставчика на самоличност (URL адрес на издателя)" is a bit literal and doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'.  'Entity Id' can be better translated to something like 'Идентификатор на обект' or 'ИД на обект'.  'Issuer URL' could be simplified to 'URL на издателя'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентификатор на обект на доставчика на самоличност (URL на издателя)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses are fine, but consider adding a hyphen for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентификатор на обект на доставчика на самоличност (URL на издателя)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Identita subjektu poskytovatele identit (adresa URL vydavatele)" is a bit too literal and complex. "Entity Id" doesn't directly translate to "Identita subjektu". A more natural translation would convey the meaning of 'Issuer' more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikátor vydavatele (URL adresa)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses around "adresa URL vydavatele" are unnecessary and break the flow. While technically correct, it's not the typical phrasing in Czech UI text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikátor vydavatele (URL adresa)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entity Id' is best translated as 'Αναγνωριστικό Οντότητας' instead of just 'Οντότητα'.  'Αναγνωριστικό' clarifies that it's the identifier.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αναγνωριστικό οντότητας παρόχου ταυτότητας (URL εκδότη)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'εκδότη' is technically correct for 'Issuer', it might be perceived as too literal and less common in a technical context. A more natural phrasing might be 'πηγή' or 'παροχέας'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αναγνωριστικό οντότητας παρόχου ταυτότητας (URL πηγής)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Identiteetin tarjoajan entiteetti Id (Myöntäjän URL)' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness in Finnish. 'Entity Id' is best translated to 'entiteetti-tunnus' in this context. 'Issuer URL' could be 'myöntäjän osoite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identiteetin tarjoajan entiteetti-tunnus (myöntäjän osoite)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Identity Provider Entity Id" is not accurately translated. "Ինքնության տրամադրող միավորների Id" is overly literal and might not be understandable to the target audience. A more natural translation for 'Identity Provider Entity Id' would be something like "էլեկտրոնային ինքնության ապրանքագիրի համարանիշ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "էլեկտրոնային ինքնության ապրանքագիրի համարանիշ" or a similar more natural phrasing for "Identity Provider Entity Id".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Թողարկողի URL" is technically correct for "Issuer URL", it could be slightly improved for clarity and fluency. It might be preferable to use a more widely understood term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more common term for "Issuer URL" like "հատուկանշման URL" or something similar, depending on the technical context and target audience's familiarity with technical terms.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'emittente' (issuer) while technically correct, isn't the most natural or commonly used term in Italian for 'issuer' in the context of identity providers. A more standard and clearer translation would be 'fornitore' or 'emittente di identità'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID entità del provider di identità (URL del fornitore) or ID entità del provider di identità (URL dell’emittente di identità)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, a more fluent Italian translation might benefit from a slightly adjusted phrasing to improve readability. The current phrasing sounds a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID entità del provider di identità – URL dell’emittente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID 제공자 엔터티 ID(발급자 URL)' is a literal translation of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. While understandable, '발급자 URL' (Issuer URL) might be too technical for a tooltip and could be simplified. 'ID 제공자 엔터티 ID' is accurate but lengthy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly translation such as 'ID 제공자 엔터티 ID' or '엔터티 ID (발급 URL)' depending on the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Parentheses usage: While not strictly wrong, the placement of the parentheses around '발급자 URL' might feel slightly awkward in Korean. It's a direct translation of the English formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to integrate the URL information more naturally into the sentence, potentially using a dash or a different phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation is identical to the English content. It needs to be translated into Lao, not simply copied.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: This requires a proper Lao translation of "Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)".  A possible translation could be something like "ລະຫັດຕົວຕົນຜູ້ອອກສາບສຽງ (URL ຂອງຜູ້ອອກສາບສຽງ)" (Ra-hat tua-ton phuu ok saap-siang (URL khong phuu ok saap-siang)).  A more precise translation may require consulting with a Lao language expert.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrādis' appears to be a mistranslation of 'tooltip'. It literally translates to 'weather vane'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identitātes nodrošinātāja entītijas ID (izdevēja URL padoms)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The overall translation loses the meaning of 'tooltip' which is a short explanatory text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identitātes nodrošinātāja entītijas ID (izdevēja URL palīdzība)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Uitgever' is a direct translation of 'Publisher', not 'Issuer'. The correct term for 'Issuer' in a technical context in Dutch would be 'Uitgevende partij' or a more concise alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identity Provider Entity Id (Uitgevende partij URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID podmiotu dostawcy tożsamości (adres URL wystawcy)' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Entity Id' doesn't translate directly to 'podmiotu'. While technically correct, it’s not the most user-friendly way to express it in Polish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identyfikator dostawcy tożsamości (adres URL wystawcy)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Parentheses are used consistently, which is good. However, consider adding a space after the parentheses for improved readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identyfikator dostawcy tożsamości ( adres URL wystawcy)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ හැඳු. (නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.)." is not a precise translation of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'.  'Entity Id' is not directly conveyed and 'Issuer URL' is only partially translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අනන්‍යතා සේවාකරුගේ අනන්‍ය හැඳුනුරුව (නිකුත්කරුගේ URL).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses to explain "(නිකුත්කරුගේ ඒ.ස.නි.)" feels slightly awkward and potentially confusing for the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the parentheses and potentially rephrase the explanation as a separate sentence or expand the initial translation to be more understandable without needing an explanation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Issuer URL' is better translated as 'URL zdroja identity' rather than 'URL vydavateľa'. 'Vydavateľ' implies a publisher, while 'zdroj' accurately reflects the origin of identity information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikátor entity poskytovateľa identity (URL zdroja identity)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Issuer URL' is best translated as 'URL izdajatelja' rather than 'URL izdajatelja'.  While 'izdajatelja' is technically correct, 'ponudnika' (provider) fits the context better for Identity Provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID subjekta ponudnika identitete (URL ponudnika)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Entitet IdP-а (URL издаваоца)' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. While 'Entitet' is acceptable for 'Entity', the rest is less clear and could be misinterpreted. 'Issuer URL' is a technical term and the translation doesn't convey that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikacioni ID Davalaca Identiteta (URL izdavaoca)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'IdP-а' uses a hyphen which, while understandable, is not the standard way of writing in Serbian. A space would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP a

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Entitet IdP-a (URL izdavaoca)" isn't the most natural or accurate translation of "Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. 'Entitet' can be interpreted as 'entity,' but a more common term would be 'Davalac' or 'Pružalac' for 'Provider.' Also 'URL izdavaoca' is less idiomatic than 'URL davalca identiteta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Davalac identiteta (URL izdavaoca)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Using 'IdP-a' is acceptable, but could be improved for readability. It's an abbreviation and might not be immediately clear to all users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP (URL izdavaoca)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kimlik Sağlayıcı Varlık Kimliği (Sağlayıcı URL)' is a literal translation and doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)'. The term 'Entity Id' can be tricky to translate directly. A more natural Turkish phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kimlik Sağlayıcı Tanımlayıcısı (Yayıncı URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Id nhà cung cấp thực thể (IdP) (URL nhà phát hành)' isn't a completely accurate or natural translation of "Identity Provider Entity Id (Issuer URL)". 'Nhà phát hành' literally means 'issuer', but in this context, it's less common or clear to use.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Một số gợi ý: 'ID nhà cung cấp danh tính (Issuer URL)', 'ID thực thể nhà cung cấp dịch vụ xác thực (Issuer URL)', or 'ID nhà cung cấp dịch vụ xác thực (Issuer URL)'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses are a bit awkward. Using a more common pattern of explanation/translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider changing the formatting to something like: 'ID thực thể nhà cung cấp dịch vụ xác thực (Issuer URL)' or 'ID nhà cung cấp dịch vụ xác thực (Issuer URL)'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "发布者 URL" (fabu zhe URL) is a literal translation of "Issuer URL" and might not be the most natural or understandable way to express it in Chinese.  '发布者' implies a publisher, which isn't the intended meaning. A better term to convey 'Issuer' in this context is '签发者' (qiansha zhe) which means 'Issuer' or 'Signer'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 身份供应商实体 ID（签发者 URL）
